title: Talkspace CEO Says Text Therapy Is More Affordable
itunes:title: Talkspace CEO Says Text Therapy Is More Affordable
description:
Oren Frank, CEO at Talkspace, discusses how text therapy works and how it enables more people to get help than traditional therapy. He also explains how the coronavirus pandemic has contributed to an increase in mental health issues across the U.S.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
